short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms browser into a visual journey through the ancient and modern marvels of Rome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring high-resolution photos capturing the grandeur and intricate details of this ancient amphitheater, this theme allows you to immerse yourself in the timeless elegance of the Colosseum every time you open a new tab. With customizable settings for light or dark modes, users can enjoy vibrant daytime views or the majestic illumination of the Colosseum at night. Perfect for history enthusiasts and admirers of architectural marvels, this extension brings the legendary spirit of the Colosseum directly to your screen.

Some useful features:
- Notepad
- ToDo
- Links
- Apps
- History
- Bookmarks
- Downloads
- Search box
- Clock
